questions.question: What does Joey start building in his apartment?
options: An entertainment unit with a mail cubby
questions.correct_answer: An entertainment unit with a mail cubby
questions.explanation: Joey tells Chandler that he started building a place for the mail, but then decided to take it to the next step and build an entertainment unit with a mail cubby.

questions.question: What is the name of the jeans Joey is wearing?
questions.explanation: Chandler comments on how tight Joey's pants are, and Joey replies that they are his old work pants, Sergio Valente's.

questions.question: Who is Phoebe waiting for outside Central Perk?
questions.explanation: Phoebe is pacing back and forth outside Central Perk, waiting for her brother Frank to arrive.

questions.question: What is the name of the game that Monica and Ross used to play as kids?
questions.explanation: Monica mentions that she and Ross used to play a game called the Shadow Game when they were kids.

questions.question: What is on Chandler's 'freebie list'?
options: Kim Basinger, Cindy Crawford, Halle Berry, Yasmine Bleeth, and Jessica Rabbit
Uma Thurman, Winona Ryder, Elizabeth Hurely, Michelle Pfieffer, and Dorothy Hammel
Isabella Rosselini, Julia Roberts, Sandra Bullock, Meg Ryan, and Cameron Diaz
Jennifer Lopez, Gwyneth Paltrow, Charlize Theron, Renee Zellweger, and Kate Hudson
questions.correct_answer: Kim Basinger, Cindy Crawford, Halle Berry, Yasmine Bleeth, and Jessica Rabbit
questions.explanation: Chandler reveals his 'freebie list' to the gang, which includes Kim Basinger, Cindy Crawford, Halle Berry, Yasmine Bleeth, and Jessica Rabbit.

questions.question: Why does Ross take Isabella Rosselini off his list?
options: Because she is not his type
Because she is international and not always in the country
Because he thinks she is too old
Because he thinks she is too young
questions.correct_answer: Because she is international and not always in the country
questions.explanation: Ross takes Isabella Rosselini off his list because Chandler points out that she is international and not always in the country, making it unlikely that he would be able to sleep with her.

questions.question: What does Frank like to do as a hobby?
questions.explanation: Frank tells Phoebe that he likes to melt things, and is later seen melting a plastic spoon and a fire extinguisher's hose.

questions.question: What is the name of the place where Phoebe works?
questions.explanation: Phoebe works at a place called Healing Hands Inc., where she gives people massages.

questions.question: What does Joey try to fit into at the end of the episode?
options: A hole in the entertainment center
questions.correct_answer: A hole in the entertainment center
questions.explanation: Joey tries to fit into a hole in the entertainment center, and successfully does so, winning a bet with Chandler.

questions.question: What is the problem with the entertainment unit that Joey builds?
questions.explanation: The entertainment unit that Joey builds is so long that it blocks some of both Chandler and Joey's bedroom doors.

questions.question: What is the name of the actress that Ross tries to hit on at Central Perk?
questions.explanation: Ross tries to hit on Isabella Rosselini at Central Perk, but is unsuccessful.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe get upset with Frank?
options: Because he thinks she is a hooker
Because he doesn't like her cooking
questions.correct_answer: Because he thinks she is a hooker
questions.explanation: Phoebe gets upset with Frank because he thinks she is a hooker, and makes a pass at one of her coworkers at her workplace, Healing Hands Inc.

questions.question: What does Monica and Rachel's bathroom floor look like after Joey tries to retile it?
options: It has a hole in the middle
questions.correct_answer: It has a hole in the middle
questions.explanation: Joey tries to retile Monica and Rachel's bathroom floor, but ends up making a mess and creating a hole in the middle of the floor.

questions.question: What does Ross use to try to impress Isabella Rosselini?
options: His list of famous people he's allowed to sleep with
questions.correct_answer: His list of famous people he's allowed to sleep with
questions.explanation: Ross tries to impress Isabella Rosselini by showing her his list of famous people he's allowed to sleep with, but ends up embarrassing himself.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the girl at Healing Hands Inc. when Frank touches her?
questions.explanation: The girl at Healing Hands Inc. is angry when Frank touches her, and accuses him of breaking her arm.

questions.question: What does Phoebe give to Frank at the end of their time together?
questions.explanation: Phoebe gives Frank a fire extinguisher at the end of their time together, saying 'just in case'.

questions.question: Why does Ross's attempt to hit on Isabella Rosselini fail?
options: Because he shows her his list of famous people he's allowed to sleep with
questions.correct_answer: Because he shows her his list of famous people he's allowed to sleep with
questions.explanation: Ross's attempt to hit on Isabella Rosselini fails because he shows her his list of famous people he's allowed to sleep with, which she finds embarrassing and off-putting.

questions.question: What is the result of Joey's bet with Chandler?
options: Joey gets stuck in the entertainment center
questions.explanation: Joey wins the bet with Chandler by successfully fitting into the hole in the entertainment center, and gets $5 as a result.

questions.question: What is the name of the game that Monica and Ross used to play as kids, according to Monica?
questions.explanation: Monica mentions that she and Ross used to play a game called the Shadow Game when they were kids, but the rules of the game are not clearly explained.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the gang when Ross tries to hit on Isabella Rosselini?
options: They are embarrassed and try to stop him
questions.explanation: The gang is amused and entertained by Ross's attempt to hit on Isabella Rosselini, with Rachel even joking that they should get popcorn to watch.

questions.question: What does Frank do to the fire extinguisher's hose?
questions.explanation: Frank melts the fire extinguisher's hose, which Phoebe had given him 'just in case'.

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's initial nervousness about meeting her brother Frank?
options: She is worried that he will not like her
She is worried that he will be late
She is worried that he will not feel like a brother to her
She is worried that he will not want to spend time with her
questions.correct_answer: She is worried that he will not feel like a brother to her
questions.explanation: Phoebe is nervous about meeting her brother Frank because she wants him to feel like a brother to her, and is worried that their relationship will not be close or connected.

questions.question: What does Chandler use to block the doors of the entertainment center?
questions.explanation: Chandler uses a 2x4 to block the doors of the entertainment center, trapping Joey inside.

questions.question: What is the final result of Ross's list of famous people he's allowed to sleep with?
options: He successfully sleeps with one of the people on the list
He is rejected by all of the people on the list
He decides to add Isabella Rosselini to the list
He decides to remove Isabella Rosselini from the list and replace her with someone else
questions.correct_answer: He is rejected by Isabella Rosselini, who was not even on the list
questions.explanation: Ross's attempt to hit on Isabella Rosselini fails, and she reveals that she had actually considered putting him on her own list of people to sleep with, but had already replaced him with someone else.
